towers.name: Chicken Tower
towers.description:
The Chicken is an offensive
tower with a cannon that
shoots eggs. Its damage and
attack speed are both
average. Its first upgrade
increases its attack speed
and its second upgrade
increases its range.

towers.name: Cow Tower
towers.description:
The Cow has both offensive
and supportive capabilties. It
releases a burp cloud that
deals constant damage. Its
first upgrade increases its
damage and its second upgrade
buffs the attack speed of
non-cow towers near it.

towers.name: Spider Tower
towers.description:
The Spider is a support
turret with the ability
to slow down enemies
as well as make enemies
weaker to other 
turrets'damage. Its
first upgrade increases
its slow. Its 
second upgrade allows
it to attack enemies.

towers.name: Eagle Tower
towers.description:
The Eagle is a hard hitter
that ignores some of the
enemies defense. Its first
upgrade increases its damage
and its second upgrade
provides a damage buff to
allies within its range.

towers.name: Elephant Tower
towers.description:
The Elephant is a mortar,
high damage but inaccurate.
You control where they fire
by pressing/holding X on a
desired spot when having them
selected. Its first upgrade
improves its accuracy and its
second upgrade increases its
damage.

towers.name: Penguin Tower
towers.description:
The Penguin has both offense
and crowd control at its
disposal. Its attacks deal
some damage and slightly
slow enemies. Its first
upgrade increases its attack
speed and its second upgrade
increases the slow on its
attack.
